Activity: Check emails and system notifications. Review the test plan to ensure familiarity and resolve any immediate questions.
Set up the test environment. Install the latest build of the game. Configure test hardware and software according to the test plan requirements.
Begin executing the first set of test cases, focusing on character movement and basic interactions. Meticulously document any bugs or issues encountered.
Document bugs in the bug tracking system (Jira). Include detailed steps to reproduce the bug, expected vs. actual results, and screenshots/videos as needed. @LPRO-1 Please take a look at these bugs.
Continue executing test cases. Focus on the shooting mechanics and combat system. Document any issues with weapon balance, hit detection, or AI behavior.
Verify fixed bugs from previous builds. Retest the bugs that were reported as fixed to ensure that the issues have been resolved and no new issues have been introduced.
Conduct ad-hoc testing, exploring the game world and mechanics in unexpected ways. Try to break the game and uncover hidden bugs.
Summarize testing progress. Prepare a daily report outlining the number of test cases executed, the number of bugs found, and any significant observations.
